JOB DESCRIPTION: Roles and Responsibilities- 10+ years of experience in Java, Microservices, No SQL DB, web services, Springboot, MVC containers etc.- Experience working with Java, REST, SOAP, and creating web services.- Knowledge of tools such as JAXB, Jackson, and GSON.- Experience with Microservice development and the application of DDD concepts- Experience with Spring or Spring Boot.- Experience with MongoDB, Influx DB or similar No SQL databases- Experience with SQL and RDBMS systems.- Scrum master certification or experience

EDUCATION.UG: BCA in Computers, B.Sc in Any Specialization, B.Tech/B.E. in Any Specialization
